pages.text: The Moon is the natural satellite orbiting around a planet designated "Earth," home to Humans, Silurians and Sea Devils. The Moon was created when a proto-planet by the name of Thea collided with the early Earth, the resulting debris came to form the moon.

A few structures can be found on its surface - namely a temple. This temple can also be found on the surface of Mars and contains valuable items of interest, including a data crystal that may be used to craft an enigmatic data drive. Who knows that it contains...
